prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message: Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: HealthAndWellnessDaily Title: The Impact of Climate Change on Mental Health: An Unseen Crisis Description: This article discusses the growing concern over the potential consequences of climate change on mental health. It includes insights from leading psychologists, environmentalists and policymakers.
Yeah that sounds interesting

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: FoodieWorld Title: The Rise of Plant-Based Diets: A Sociocultural Perspective Description: This article delves into the growing popularity of plant-based diets, examining the sociocultural factors that have contributed to this shift, and exploring the potential implications for the future of food.
That sounds alright, do you have any articles on technology?

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: FinanceGuru Title: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency: Transforming the Future of Global Economy Description: This article provides an in-depth analysis of the impact of Blockchain and Cryptocurrency on the global economy. It covers the latest trends, challenges, and future outlook of these technologies.
yeah that sounds good.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: ArtistryMag
Title: The Intersection of Technology and Art: An Innovative Fusion
Description: This article explores the novel blend of technology and art, shedding light on how technology is influencing contemporary art practices, leading to the creation of fascinating new genres and revolutionizing the way art is perceived and appreciated.
Sure, but do you have any articles on movies/tv?

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: SpaceVentures
Title: Mars Colonization: The New Frontier in Space Exploration
Description: This article dives into the ambitious plans and cutting-edge technology that are driving humanity's quest to colonize Mars. It features interviews with leading scientists and explores the potential benefits and challenges of life on the Red Planet.
I do like Mars

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: GamingUniverse Title: The Evolution of Video Games and their Impact on Society and Culture Description: This article traces the history of video games, discussing their evolution from simple arcade games to the complex, immersive worlds of today. It also explores how video games have influenced society and culture, and what the future might hold for this dynamic medium.
Yes, I do enjoy videogames

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: FutureTravel Title: The Future of Sustainable Travel: Embracing Eco-Tourism and Responsible Travel Description: This article delves into the growing global trend of sustainable travel methods, showcasing innovative solutions for eco-tourism and responsible travel practices. It explores how these changes could reshape the travel industry and our planet.
anything on tourism and technology?

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: FashionTechInsights Title: The Transformation of Fashion Industry through Artificial Intelligence Description: This article provides an insightful perspective on how artificial intelligence is revolutionizing the fashion industry, from designing to manufacturing and retail. It also discusses the ethical implications of integrating AI into fashion and what it means for the future of this industry.
No, I do not care for fashion

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: SportsTechGuide
Title: The Rise of eSports: The Intersection of Gaming, Technology, and Professional Sports
Description: This article unravels the emergence and rapid growth of eSports, examining how advancements in technology and the gaming industry are reshaping the world of professional sports. It provides an analysis of the eSports industry, its impact on traditional sports, and the future outlook.
ooo sports are fun

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: EduTechReview
Title: The Influence of Virtual Reality on Education: A New Era for Learning
Description: This article focuses on the integration of Virtual Reality (VR) in education, exploring its potential to transform traditional learning methods. It dives into the benefits and challenges of VR-based education, provides examples of its implementation, and discusses what this technology could mean for the future of education worldwide.
These are great articles

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: QuantumPhysicsToday Title: Quantum Computing: The Next Leap in Technology Description: This article provides a deep dive into the fascinating and complex world of quantum computing. It presents the basics of quantum mechanics, explains how quantum computers work, discusses their potential applications, and explores the challenges that scientists face in making quantum computing a reality. It also offers thoughts on what the advent of quantum computing could mean for the future of technology, privacy, and the world at large.
eh maybe not that one

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: AnimalPlanetNews Title: Technological Advancements in Wildlife Conservation: A Beacon of Hope Description: This article takes a deep dive into how modern technology is playing a pivotal role in wildlife conservation. It highlights cutting-edge technologies like AI, drones, and GPS tracking, and how they are used to monitor, protect, and preserve various species. It also discusses the potential ethical considerations and future prospects in this field.
Animals are fun. Maybe a good article

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: SocietyandTechInsights Title: The Influence of Social Media Algorithms on Political Views: An In-depth Analysis Description: This article delves into the little-known world of social media algorithms and their potential influence on shaping political views. It brings to light how these algorithms work, the extent of their reach, and the implications on democracy and free speech. It includes insights from leading data scientists, politicians and sociologists.
Issues on social media interest me

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: HistoricalTech
Title: The Evolution of Computing: From Abacus to Quantum Computers
Description: This article takes you on an intriguing journey through the evolution of computing, from the ancient abacus to the cutting-edge quantum computers of today. It offers a comprehensive understanding of how each breakthrough has revolutionized the technology landscape, transforming the way our society functions. It also speculates where the future of computing might lead us.
that sounds cool

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: EnvironmentalTech 
Title: Harnessing Technology for Sustainable Agriculture: A Path Towards Food Security and Ecosystem Conservation 
Description: This article discusses the intersection of technology and agriculture, showcasing how innovations are helping to create sustainable farming practices. It delves into digital farming, precision agriculture, and the role of AI in crop management. It also explores the potential implications on food security, environmental conservation, and climate change mitigation.
not interested

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: LiteratureTechReview
Title: The Impact of E-Books and Audiobooks on Reading Habits and Literacy Rates 
Description: This article explores the rise of digital reading formats, like e-books and audiobooks, and their impact on reading habits and literacy rates worldwide. It delves into the technological advancements that have made these formats possible and accessible, and discusses their implications on traditional publishing, libraries, education, and the future of reading.
yes interested

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: MusicTechInnovations Title: The Resonance of AI in Music Creation: Disruption or Revolution? Description: This article delves into the evolving role of artificial intelligence in music creation and production. It explores how AI is being used to compose music, create unique sounds, and even perform live. It also discusses the potential implications for musicians, the music industry, and listeners around the world.
yes interested

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: AutoTechInsights 
Title: Autonomous Vehicles and Smart Cities: A Transportation Revolution 
Description: This article delves into the future of transportation with autonomous vehicles and their pivotal role in the development of smart cities. It discusses the current state of autonomous vehicle technology, the infrastructural changes needed for their integration into urban landscapes, and the potential social, economic, and environmental impacts. It also discusses the legal and ethical challenges that autonomous vehicles present.
yes

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: BioTechInsider
Title: The Role of Genetic Engineering in Producing Sustainable Biofuels: A Potential Solution for the Climate Crisis?
Description: This article delves into the intricate field of genetic engineering, particularly its potential in creating more efficient and sustainable biofuels. It explores the latest research in the field, the ethical and safety concerns associated with genetic modifications, and its potential implications on the global energy landscape and climate change mitigation.
yes

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: ExperimentalPsychologyInsights
Title: The Role of Technology in Altering Human Behaviors and Perceptions: A Psychological Perspective
Description: This article provides a comprehensive understanding of how technology impacts human behavior, cognition, and perception from a psychological perspective. It delves into the psychological theories underpinning the influence of technology on human nature, exploring the effects of social media, gaming, virtual reality, and AI on our minds. It further discusses the potential implications for mental health, interpersonal relationships, and societal norms.

query_prompt.content:
Your task is to learn what topics a user is interested in reading online article about. People's interests are broad, so you should seek to understand their interests across many topics; in other words, go for breadth rather than depth. Do not assume a user has given a complete answer to any question, so make sure to keep probing different types of interests.

Come up with a potential edge case to learn as much information as you can about what their desired behavior should be under different circumstances.
Make sure the edge case addresses different aspects of the system than the edge cases that have already been considered.

An example edge case is: Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: TechTalkDaily
Title: 10 Must-Have Gadgets for 2023: A Comprehensive Guide
Description: Discover the top 10 gadgets that will revolutionize your daily life in 2023. From smart home devices to the latest wearables, we've got you covered with our comprehensive guide.

Current cases:
- [Q] -> [A]

Generate the most informative edge case that, when answered, will reveal the most about the desired behavior beyond what has already been queried for above. Generate the edge case in the following format, and nothing else: "Are you interested in the following article? [edge case]"
